content: own chain loop turn back the work 1 single_crochet in the same 3ch-space you started from my most frequent mistake was that i forgot about this single_crochet so please be mindful of that and then you move to the next 3ch-space and you work around the next bpdc close the round with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet made in this round round #5 make 1 single_crochet in every single_crochet from round #4 to obtain a nice edge this will give you exactly 2*24 = 48 single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch to the first single_crochet made in this round magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #6 repeat 24 times double_crochet-increase in single_crochet 1 double_crochet in single_crochet close the round with a slip_stitch and mark the 6th double_crochet made in this round you have 24* 2+1 = 24*3 = 72 double_crochet all around round #7 repeat 24 times 3 double_crochet 1 fpquadtr around the marked double_crochet from round #6 move the marker 3 double_crochet to your left counterclockwise close the round with a slip_stitch you have 24* 3 double_crochet + 1 fpquadtr = 24*4 = 96 stitches all around all fpquadtr s should stand out like ears from jugs round #8 this stitch comes from the doily momentous occasion by patricia kristoffersen first watch the video and then maybe read the instructions https //www youtube com/watch v=or3fk8q-r6w in this film you can also see how i make the 1st false double_crochet instead of making 3 chain repeat only 23 times 3 double_crochet in the back loop pull up the previous fpquadtr under the next fpquadtr and make 1 fpdc around the previous fpquadtr the one you pulled up the round is not finished yet in the 24th repeat we need to increase the height of the stitch because from now on we will work in a spiral not a circle in the 24th repeat make 3 tc in the back loop and then a fpdtc instead fpdc from this point on we will never close rounds with a slip_stitch it will be one very long spiral round which will end when the string ends d if you want to you can mark the ending of the round with a hair pin or a safety pin also from now on i will mark front-post stitches in blue magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #9 repeat 24 times 1 double_crochet in the back loop double_crochet-increase in the back loop 1 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the fpdc of round #8 i remind you do not close the round with a slip stitch not now not ever round #10 repeat 24 times 2 double_crochet in the back loop fptc around the previous fpdc from round #9 2 double_crochet in the back loop 1 fpdc around the next fpdc from round #9 round #11 it s time for a puff video
